sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词含有"伸展，延长"或"延伸"之意。
means: extend ： 指时间或空间的延长，也可指影响和使用范围等的扩大。
lengthen ： 指把长度或期限拉长或延长，其反义是shorten。
stretch ： 指长度的延伸以及宽度的增加。
prolong ： 通常指时间上延长得超过了一般或正常的限度。

sentence.Network_en: She had to lengthen her stirrup leathers.
He asked the tailor to lengthen his coat.
sentence.Network_cn: 他请裁缝把他的外衣放长些.

sentence.Network_en: Ask the tailor to lengthen this skirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 请裁缝把这条裙子放长.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 个人简历英文翻译词汇大全_百度文库 ... lead 领导 lengthen 延长 lessen 减少（生产成本）.
CAD快捷命令大全 ... MI,*MIRROR 镜像 LEN,*LENGTHEN 拉长（修改对象的长度和圆弧的包含角） O,*OFFSET 偏移.
CAD快捷键_百度文库 ... S,*STRETCH （拉伸） LEN,*LENGTHEN （直线拉长） SC,*SCALE （比例缩放）.
初中英语重点单词_百度知道 ... tourist n. 旅游者，观光者 lengthen v. (使)变长，延伸 settle vt. 调停；安排；支付.

list.abs: 1. line log amplifierline lengthener 线长延伸器line matching unit 线路匹配器

entry.def: When something lengthens or when you lengthen it, it increases in length.

example.tran: 残阳下的影子越拉越长。

example.ex: She began to walk faster, but he lengthened his stride to keep up with her...
example.tran: 她开始加快步子，但他加大了步幅跟着她。

entry.tran: （使）（时间）延长；（使…）持续更长时间
entry.def: When something lengthens or when you lengthen it, it lasts for a longer time than it did previously.

example.ex: Vacations have lengthened and the work week has shortened...
example.tran: 假期延长，工作周就缩短了。

example.ex: The council does not support lengthening the school day to fit in other activities.
example.tran: 委员会不支持通过延长在校时间来插入其他活动。

auth_sentence.content: They'd diminish the game to lengthen their careers.
auth_sentence.res_content: They'd diminish the game to lengthen their careers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They'd diminish the game to lengthen their careers.

auth_sentence.content: We have some very important ideas to test that might lengthen your life.
auth_sentence.res_content: We have some very important ideas to test that might lengthen your life.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We have some very important ideas to test that might lengthen your life.

auth_sentence.content: Horizontal lines will widen the face, while vertical lines will lengthen it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Horizontal lines will widen the face, while vertical lines will lengthen it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Horizontal lines will widen the face, while vertical lines will lengthen it.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

Sentence.sentence: The lengthening path to adulthood appears exacerbated (恶化) by parental involvement in the college years.

sentences.en: In summer, the daylight hour lengthens.
sentences.cn: 夏天, 白天的时间长。
